text:
Per @VeteransHealth's Dir Dr. Richard Stone, @DeptVetAffairs is indeed going to administer the #COVID19 #vaccine to Tier 1 and Tier 2 #Caregivers at the same priority level as the catastrophically disabled #Veterans for whom they care!
WHAT A WIN FOR VETERANS AND CAREGIVERS!! https://t.co/7KlcxPpvS4
